import React from 'react'; import 'antd/dist/antd.css'; import { Card } from 'antd'; import './cssFile/Information.css'; const Information = () => { return (

Non Contact

Non contact type compact vibration sensor, to detect health assets of your machine

Real Time monitoring

We Prioritize hard real time. We monitor your machines real time to update any change that may have occurred.

Multiple Asset monitoring

Track multiple assets in a common place

Low Cost

Monitor all the sensitive information of your machines at an minimal cost.

Predictive AI

Leverage the AI algorithms to detect occurrence of error.

Multiple Asset monitoring

Track multiple assets in a common place

); } export default Information;
